_sText:
Fy_ctf_iceworldz

By ZaLoS

Custom textures by ZaLoS, IceCreamLock


CTF!!!

Each team has a flag, the first to take the other teams flag and return it to their base, while their own flag is in their base, wins!

Losers BURN.

(Specifically: The losing team will catch on fire and burn for 15secs then get hit by 1k damage)


How it works:

To pick up the flag you need to drop your pistol and pick up the pistol the flag is attached to. 

To score, carry your flag back to your base and drop it near your flag, if your flag is not there you can not score.


NOTE: This map is not intended for DeathMatch servers. This map will not crash a deathmatch server however the CTF portion of gameplay will not work properly. This is caused by the DM mod destroying guns after people die. This also destroys the flag when people die, or try to score a point.


Special thanks:
The Kosher Pork for seting up the beta and to all the beta testers! Additional thanks to fpsbanana.com, www.solidsurf.info

I created this map in the vision of fy_iceworld, I did not decompile the original map. Everything was made from scratch from my best memory.
